title: Net Effective Rent of $3150 1bed/1bath @ The Asher!!
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 747 Sq.
Timeless style meets refreshingly approachable living at The Asher—the first of its kind in Fremont.
With stylish apartments, six distinct courtyards and a signature Linear Green, this is where undeniable urban energy meets endless moments to engage, retreat or relax.

Spacious Walk-in Closets, Full-size Vented Washer & Dryer, Kitchen Island – in Select Homes, 10 foot ceiling height – in select units, Stainless French Door Refrigerator, Custom Roller Shades, Private Decks, Air conditioning throughout, Deep Soaking Tub with Tile Surround, Sun filled units due to expansive windows, Extensive Kitchen Cabinet Space, Gas Range, Wood-look Luxury Flooring

Pet Spa, Fitness Club with Yoga/Spin Studio, Bocce Ball Court, Clubhouse with TV Lounge & Game Room, EV Charging Available, Shaded Pavilions with BBQs, The Village Co-working Space, Roof Deck with Pool, Firepits, & Outdoor TVs, Linear Green Promenade with Wine Bar, Full Catering Kitchen, Resort Pool & Spa with Private Cabanas, Bike Shop, Dedicated Transportation Center, Lush Courtyards & Green Spaces
Use this link for more information:
bart easy commute fremont rentals apartments new luxury pool fitness center great location
2GKTYxYqMwU* Net Effective Rent included in pricing based off a 17 month lease term
